text: Mata arra ga,(teki no) 2tsu no tai no naka, 1tsu wa anata gata no monodearou, to yakusoku sa reta toki o omoe. Sonotoki anata gata wa buso shinai ichi-tai ga, anata gata no monodearu yo ni to nozonda. Daga arra wa o jibun no o kotoba ni yori, shinri o shinri to shite tate rare, fushin-sha ga, konzetsu suru koto o nozoma reru
